channel.title: Publishing the server
channel.description: hmm i dont know if i should post it here but i watched hundreads of videos and a lot guides but i just cant solve it im useing aggroth pi v2 so i created a host at no-ip but when i use that host as my server ip it wont log in and everyone keep telling me to portforward i have set rsps on port 45394 on my router and i dont get what is happining im a biggner coder so i dont have knowladge in this sorry for my bad english can just anyone help me?

item.title: Publishing the server
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Don’t listen to arean, I removed his post because he seemed like an ass.

Find out what type of router you have and go here. Select the router you have and the page will tell you how to open ports.
EDIT: Opening ports allows people to connect to your router through a specific port, having different ports for different things is like a filing cabinet.

Read full topic
